data.title: Welcome to the Home of the Topnotchers
data.meta_description: Established in 1967, OLFU is a higher education institution in the Philippines offering pre-school to post-graduate programs.
data.text:
The Home of the Topnotchers!

Applications are now open for SY 2024-2025

Welcome to the

Home of the Topnotchers

Why study at OLFU?

With over 50 years of successfully developing Achievers

Incomparable value-for-money for the high quality of education provided

An Inclusive University with open doors to anyone with a thirst for learning: No entrance exams and down payment as low as Php 1,500 to enroll

Multiple options on flexible payment terms and financial aid

Affordable fees

Flexible Tuition Payment Terms

Track record of top-notchers and top performing school citations in the licensure examinations

Programs

Our Lady of Fatima University’s roots begin in its Nursing Program and followed soon after by its Medicine Program. These two heritage offerings brought early accolade and spurred on the founding of a rich mix of other paramedical and non-medical programs. And in keeping with its compass of “improving man as man”, the University diversified by catering to all levels of learning from early childhood to post-graduate education.

Research & Development

The Research Development and Innovation Center (RDIC), as the university research arm, is guided by certain guiding principles and philosophies. Aligned with the university vision mission- core values statements, the research center envisions itself to be a global trailblazer of quality and innovative research.
